price: Ka ce: "Shin, wancan ne mafi alhẽri, kõ kuwa Aljannar dawwama wadda aka yi wa'adi ga mãsu taƙawa? Tã zama, a gare su, sakamako da makõma."
arabic: قُلۡ أَذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٌ أَمۡ جَنَّةُ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ ٱلَّتِي وُعِدَ ٱلۡمُتَّقُونَۚ كَانَتۡ لَهُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَمَصِيرٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul adhālika khayrun am jannatu al-khul'di allatī wuʿida al-mutaqūna kānat lahum jazāan wamaṣīran
